song.title: A--nie Rabu Damon
song.info:
Original JP title: ア○ニーラブだもん。 Joke entry, entered in Famicompo Mini vol.6's original section.
Probably based on a true story, this is a heart-breaking tale between a teacher and his mischevious pupil's seductive pleas for some good ol' long-time traditional Japanese finger-clasping.
Shameless pastiche of early 90s R&B wank I used to listen to in the radio from the likes of Jodeci, Shai, Keith Sweat, and R. Kelly. That, and series like Kodomo no Jikan. Hmmm, and also certain books I managed to buy in Toranoana one fateful day. With surprising traps underneath. Yep.
Original format: NSF (2A03 + VRC6). Lyrics (japanese + english): http://www.nanjamonja.com/muzak/ananierabudamon_scenario.txt ([url=https://web.archive.org/web/20100815192732/http://www.nanjamonja.com/muzak/ananierabudamon_scenario.txt]Web Archive[/url])
Note: "Anal love" is an incorrect translation for the name of this song. The artist does not approve that.
